Constructs a sentinel.

@1@ Default constructor. [[cpp/language/value_initialization|Value-initializes]] the underlying sentinel.
@2@ Initializes the underlying sentinel with {{c|end}}.
@3@ Conversion from {{c|/*sentinel*/&lt;false&gt;}} to {{c|/*sentinel*/&lt;true&gt;}}. Move constructs corresponding members.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par | end | a sentinel representing the end of (possibly const-qualified) {{tt|V}} }}
{{par | i | a {{c|/*sentinel*/&lt;false&gt;}} }}
{{par end}}
